summary: This is an email chain from May 6, 2022, discussing logistical planning for victim support services at the upcoming sentencing of Ghislaine Maxwell in June 2022. The FBI Victim Services Division is coordinating to ensure victims are comfortable and assisted during the sentencing proceedings.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain is her upcoming sentencing in June 2022.

events.title: Maxwell Sentencing
events.description: Planned sentencing hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell, with FBI Victim Services coordinating support for victims attending.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively planning victim support for Ghislaine Maxwell's sentencing in June 2022.
The sentencing was anticipated to occur around June 28, 2022.
The email indicates coordination between FBI personnel to ensure victims would be comfortable and assisted during the sentencing proceedings.
